title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Introducing the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor, a stunning addition to your home decor collection. 

Featuring a captivating design of circles on circles, this wall art is sure to make a statement in any room. Made with high-quality annealed glass, the mirrors offer HD imaging and prevent warping and distortion. The gold frame, with its matte and bright finish, adds a touch of elegance to the overall look. 

Each set includes two mirrors, allowing for free styling and combination with other wall art. With a diameter of 15.7 inches with the frame and 10 inches for the mirror alone, these mirrors are the perfect size to adorn your walls. 

Crafted from durable iron, the frame ensures longevity and stability. Hanging these mirrors is a breeze, thanks to the single screw hanging method. Weighing just 2 lbs, they are lightweight and easy to handle. 

The versatility of these mirrors is unmatched. They match with various decoration styles and can be placed in the living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, or office space. You can even create a picture wall, display them above your TV, or combine them with paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces. 

With their modern, artistic design and easy installation, these mirrors are a must-have for anyone seeking to elevate their interior decor. They come in a decent package to ensure safe delivery, so you can enjoy them in pristine condition. 

Upgrade your space with the 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor and experience the perfect blend of style and functionality.
